items.name: Template_SelectableWindow
items.content:
ui.UiFactory.customTypes["ui.SelectableWindow"] = {
    "type": "ui.FreeLayout",
    "controls": [
        {
            "type": "ui.Image",
            "style": "windowTilePattern",
            "frame": [0, 0, "100%", "100%"],
            "inheritProperties": true,
            "zIndex": 11,
            "order": 1
        },
        {
            "type": "ui.Image",
            "style": "windowStretchPattern",
            "frame": [0, 0, "100%", "100%"],
            "inheritProperties": true,
            "zIndex": 12,
            "order": 2
        },
        {
            "type": "ui.Frame",
            "styles": ["windowShadow", "selectableWindowShadow"],
            "inheritProperties": true,
            "frame": [0, 0, "100%", "100%"],
            "focusable": true,
            "order": 0,
            "zIndex": 13
        },
        {
            "type": "ui.Frame",
            "style": "windowFrame",
            "frame": [0, 0, "100%", "100%"],
            "inheritProperties": true,
            "zIndex": 14,
            "action": -> p.action
            "actions": -> p.actions
            "order": 3
        }
    ]
}
